channel.title: Time For Lineage II - Free grate RPG Game
channel.description:
I dont know if You noticed that I wasnt active from some time.. Well The time has come ... Im leaving The Rs World !
Now There is Time For Lineage II !!
Lineage II is a Free RPG Game. If you dont like Rs anymore and You are looking for something cool look at this :)
[img]http://loadedinc.com/e32003/shots/images/NCSoft/Lineage%202/sshot_lineage2_01.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img397.imageshack.us/img397/1780/shot000662os.jpg[/img]
Ok .. You like The screens ?? I hope You do :) As I said this game is totaly free !!.
So if you want to try this out this is what you have to do: Download: [b]L2_C4_Installer.zip[/b] -> form one of this mirrors: http://www.instalki.pl/gry/download/mmorpg/Lineage_2_Chronicle_4.php ( 2.31 GB ) then download: [b]L2ParadiseAutoUpdater.rar[/b] - http://www.l2-paradise.com/downloads/L2ParadiseAutoUpdater.rar have to extract this file after instalating the game to your game folder. Overwrite the old file and run. Then it will update the game and give you acces to a free server. Then the only thing You have to do is visit: http://www.l2-paradise.com/ and create account so you will be able to log in to the server. I play on Virtue 5x. My Nickname There is: Biohazardus. See You there. I hope You all come :) !!
[b]Some game info can be found at: [/b] http://lineage2.gameamp.com/ http://www.lineage2-online.com/ http://lin2.warcry.com/

item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

He means that if the exp is low, then will it go back to the previous level.
eg

Current exp, level 38:
[// ]
after death will it go down to

level 37
[///////////// ]

exp status bar:

[//////////// ] - before you die
[//////// ] - after you die

item.title: Time For Lineage II - Free grate RPG Game
item.dc:creator: @extreme300 extreme300
item.description:
@extreme300 wrote:

[quote=“Friday13th, post:16, topic:15674”]Well when you die you lose some of your XP
It looks like this: eg you are lvl 30 nad 50% to next lvl, after you die you are still lvl30 but you have 40% to next lvl. Sometimes you lose one item when you die…

Well … You want to know what Sige is ?
just look at this:)
http://video.google.pl/videoplay?docid=2412766960962708611&q=lineage+2

if you wont to know what RB is then you Have to see This one !!
http://video.google.pl/videoplay?docid=-5124758962004093331&q=lineage+2[/quote]
Dont you mean that you have 60% till next level after you are killed?

Read full topic

item.title: Time For Lineage II - Free grate RPG Game
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“waterman, post:14, topic:15674”]It says you lose exp when you die in seiges, does that mean you lose your hard earned lvls from dying??

Also what is a siege?[/quote]

Siege - The surrounding and blockading of a city, town, or fortress by an army attempting to
capture it.
A prolonged period, as of illness: a siege of asthma.
Obsolete. A seat, especially a throne.

No you don’t lose your levels. If you die constantly, it will take longer to level.

Read full topic
